act:
578345 THE INDUSTRIAL DISPUTES (BANKING COMPANIES) DECISION (REPEAL) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 19 OF 2001 [ 3rd August, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Industrial Disputes (Banking Companies) Decision Act, 1955.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
874362 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Industrial Disputes (Banking Companies) Decision (Repeal) Act, 2001.
1324242 2Repeal of Act 41 of 1955.- The Industrial Disputes (Banking Companies) Decision Act, 1955 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
